metadata.name: PowerShell PSAttack
metadata.comment: Detects the use of PSAttack PowerShell hack tool

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ps attack!!!')))

output.summary: Detects the use of PSAttack PowerShell hack tool
